items.title: Lingnan Culture · Guangfu Charm
items.desc: Cantonese Opera, Lion Dance, Dragon Boat, Herbal Tea… Guangfu culture is the deepest cultural root of the GBA, vibrant after a thousand years.

items.title: Cantonese Opera · Pearl of the South
items.desc: Cantonese Opera, hailed as the 'Pearl of the South', blends singing, recitation, acting, and acrobatics — a shared cultural bond for Cantonese communities worldwide.

items.title: Hakka Culture · Land of Walled Villages
items.desc: The famous Hakka walled villages of Shenzhen, Huizhou, and Meizhou carry Hakka folk songs and clan culture — embodying the spirit of multicultural coexistence in the GBA.

items.title: Maritime Silk Road · HK-Macao Trade Heritage
items.desc: The GBA was a key starting point of the ancient Maritime Silk Road. The open trading culture of Hong Kong and Macao blends with Lingnan traditions to create the GBA's unique character.

intro.title: About the Institute
intro.subtitle: Heritage · Innovation · Collaboration · Inclusiveness · Professionalism
intro.p1: The GBA Culture Digital Research Institute was established in the context of the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area cultural development strategy, to implement the 'GBA Development Plan' and the 'National Cultural Digitization Strategy'. The Institute is built upon a national-level industry-education integration practice base, dedicated to excavating, reconstructing, and disseminating the profound cultural heritage of the GBA through cutting-edge digital technologies.
intro.p2: As an important part of China's outstanding traditional culture, GBA culture has nurtured the brilliant Lingnan civilization, the Maritime Silk Road trade culture, the Cantonese Opera intangible heritage, and the Hakka walled village cultural tradition. The Institute bears the academic mission of protecting GBA cultural heritage in the digital era, while also leveraging multi-party collaboration to lead the transformation of cultural resources into digital assets.

leadership.title: Leadership & Structure
leadership.subtitle: Academic Research + Digital Projects + Integrated Publishing + Cross-sector Collaboration
leadership.p1: The Institute draws on top universities and institutions across the GBA, building a four-wheel-drive development system: 'Academic Research + Digital Projects + Integrated Publishing + Cross-sector Collaboration'. Key initiatives include GBA intangible heritage digitization projects, AI-driven cultural content production, and major research publications on GBA cultural heritage digital protection.

meta.title: Research | GBA Culture Digital Research Institute
meta.description: Under the national cultural digitization strategy, the Institute focuses on cultural big data standardization, AI-powered cultural productivity, digital consumption scenarios, and four major research pillars.

research.coreTitle: Core Research Directions at the National Strategy Level
research.coreSubtitle: The national cultural digitization strategy aims to build a new system from resources to production, dissemination, and consumption

items.label: Cultural data identification and linking:
items.text: Research how to link fragmented GBA cultural resources (such as scattered intangible heritage skills and artifact data) through a unified identification system to break down data silos.

items.label: Cultural data rights and value assessment:
items.text: Research on digital copyright protection, technical rights assessment, and the value generation logic for the process of transforming cultural resources into 'data assets'.

items.label: Industry standard formulation:
items.text: Using the Institute's position in the industry alliance to lead or participate in setting standards for GBA digital cultural artworks and digitized courses.

dir2.title: 2. "AI+" Cultural Productivity Research
dir2.subtitle: Responding to the national "AI-empowered new industrialization" initiative

items.label: Vertical domain large model applications:
items.text: Developing multimodal large models specifically for GBA culture and museum content, supporting automated data labeling and creative content generation.

items.label: "Living heritage" in the digital context:
items.text: Research on how to use digital technology to 'reconstruct context', transforming the virtual nature of technology into cultural 'presence', resolving the tension between technical tools and cultural values in intangible heritage preservation.

items.label: AIGC-assisted art design:
items.text: Exploring deep AI integration in Cantonese embroidery pattern design, Cantonese Opera script assistance, and digital teacher guidance scenarios.

dir3.title: 3. New Digital Cultural Consumption Scenarios & Experience Research
dir3.subtitle: Focusing on the demand side, driving intelligent and immersive transformation of the cultural industry

items.label: Immersive cultural tourism integration technology:
items.text: Leveraging technical support from GBA partner institutions to develop full-chain technology engines for construction, fusion, interaction, presentation, and evaluation.

items.label: Digital-physical integrated consumption scenarios:
items.text: Researching multi-dimensional fusion models of 'cultural tourism + esports + e-commerce + creative industries' to create new GBA cultural landmarks.

block1.title: Pillar 1: Cultural Resource Digitization & Asset Platform

items.label: Data collection and processing:
items.text: Building an integrated GBA cultural data system, utilizing cultural survey results for high-definition collection and processing.

items.label: Cultural asset key laboratory:
items.text: Focusing on cultural data labeling and digital artwork certification, transforming cultural resources into 'digital capital'.

block2.title: Pillar 2: Deep Industry-Education Integration & Talent Development Ecosystem

items.label: Regional industry-education consortium:
items.text: Leveraging multi-party collaboration to apply for national-level industry-education consortia, solving the disconnect between talent cultivation and industry needs.

items.label: Digital teaching reform:
items.text: Co-building AIGC training platforms, developing digital textbook series, cultivating composite cultural industry talent with digital literacy.

block3.title: Pillar 3: Lingnan Culture & Maritime Silk Road Digitization and Protection

items.label: Lingnan digital culture library:
items.text: Systematically protecting the three major cultural systems of Guangfu, Hakka, and Chaoshan through digitization, establishing a cultural gene database.

items.label: Maritime Silk Road cultural tourism integration:
items.text: Researching digital presentations of GBA coastal historical culture to promote regional cultural exchange and tourism integration.

block4.title: Pillar 4: Cultural Access & Social Service Scenarios

items.label: Silver economy digitization:
items.text: Developing 'Senior Learning' digital courses for an aging society, driving digitization of elderly education.

items.label: Smart cultural heritage & community empowerment:
items.text: Bringing digital achievements into communities and schools through online platforms to realize universal sharing of outcomes.
